title: Bajaj Auto-Triumph launches Speed 400, Scrambler 400X bike; check price here
description: Bajaj Auto-Triumph has launched its Speed 400 and Scrambler 400X bikes, fully manufactured in India. Both motorcycles have distinct design cues inspired by their siblings and are equipped with features such as USD forks, rear mono-shock, and disc brakes on both wheels with dual-channel ABS. Bajaj's new Chakan plant, with a monthly capacity of 5,000 units, will manufacture the Triumph products, which will be exported globally from India.
